title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 78.8 - Criminal penalties, seizures and forfeitures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 78.8 - Criminal penalties, seizures and forfeitures

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 481(4)
(a) For criminal penalties see article 37 of
the Tax Law. Such penalties are in addition to any civil penalties described in
this Title and any applicable penalties provided for in the Penal Law or
elsewhere. (See section
85.1
of this Title for additional civil penalties.)
(b) Also see article 37 of the Tax Law for
seizure and forfeiture provisions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
78.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
